flawed_nl_solution:
The drive has 1.5 * 2000 = <<1.5*2000=30000>>30000 kilobytes of storage space.
It already has 1.5 * 400 = <<1.5*400=600>>600 kilobytes of storage space taken up.
Thus, it has 30000 - 600 = <<30000-600=29400>>29400 kilobytes of space left.
The portable drive can store 29400 / 200 = <<29400/200=147>>147 200-kilobyte videos on it with 400 photos.
#### 147

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 3000, not 30000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
